Name: Verify welcome screen is displayed correctly on app launch
Precondition:
- Application is launched successfully
- User is not logged in
Objective: Ensure the welcome screen is displayed correctly on app launch
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Launch the applicaton
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: Welcome screen is displayed correctly

Name: Verify sign up free button redirects user to registration flow
Precondition:
- Application is launched successfully
- User is not logged in
Objective:
Ensure the sign up free button redirects the user to registration flow 
correctly
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Verify the sign up free button visible and enable
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: Sign up free button visible and clickable corretly

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Click on the sign up free button
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: User redirected to the registration flow correctly

Name: Verify log in button redirects user to login flow
Precondition:
- Application is launched successfully
- User is not logged in
Objective: Ensure the log in button redirects user to login flow correctly
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Verify the log in button visible and enable
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: Log in button visible and clickable correctly

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Click on the log in button
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: User is redirected to login flow correctly

Name: Verify to login with email redirects user to dashboard
Precondition:
- Application is launched successfully
- User is not logged in
Objective: Ensure the login with email redirected user to dashboard correctly
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Verify the log in button visible and enable
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: Log in button visible and clickable correctly

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Click on the log in button
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: User is redirected to login flow correctly

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Verify the Continue with email button visible and enable
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: Continue with email button visible and clickable correctly

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Click on the continue with email button
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: User is redirected to the login form correctly

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Click to the email field and enter a valid and active email
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The user can enter an email into the email field

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Click to the password field and enter a valid password
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The user can enter a valid password into the password

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Click to the login button
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: User is redirected to the dashobard successfully

Name: Verify to sign up with email redirects user to registration screen
Precondition:
- Application is launched successfully
- User is not logged in
Objective:
Ensure the sign up with email redirected user to registration screen 
correctly
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Verify the sign up free button visible and enable
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: Sign up free button visible and clickable corretly

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Click on the sign up free button
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: User redirected to the registration flow correctly

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Verify the Continue with email button visible and enable
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: Continue with email button visible and clickable correctly

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Click on the continue with email button
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: User is redirected to the sign up form correctly

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Click to the email field and enter a valid email address
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The user can enter a valid email into the email field

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Cick on the next button
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: User is redirected to the create password screen correctly

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Click to the password field and enter a valid password
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The user can enter a valid password into the password

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Click to the next button
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: User is redirected to the birthday enterance screen successfully

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Enter a valid birthday
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The system accepts the entered birthday successfully

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Click on the next button
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: User is redirected to the gender selection screen successfully

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Select a gender
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: User can select a gender successfully

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Click on the next button
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
User is redirected to the term of user and privacity policy page 
successfully

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Click on the create account button
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The system accepts entered informations and create an account successfully
